title: [Question] Hostel Vacancies
content:
lam taking admission through KCET round 2, and I want to know how much vacancies are there in hostel.

And it will be a great help if u tell me the hostel and mess range.

comments.body: Should I immediately confirm my seat as round 2 result cames? For getting available seats.

Which campus ?   
For EC - they have amaatra which i believe does have a good amount of vacancy
not sure then - heard from friends there is an adjacent hostel or something like that, and they were kicking out bangaloreans
